product_overview: Academeet is a real-time web application that streamlines professor-student consultations by letting professors publish availability windows which auto-generate 15-minute slots, and allowing students to book slots with a required pre-consultation agenda. Role-based access control and realtime slot status updates prevent double-bookings and ensure appropriate access for students and professors.
core_goals: Enforce strong role-based authentication and route protection so students and professors only access permitted interfaces.
Allow professors to create availability windows that auto-generate contiguous 15-minute slots.
Provide students a real-time slot grid with forced agenda validation (minimum 10 characters) before booking.
Prevent double-bookings via atomic server-side checks and realtime updates (Supabase Realtime).
Deliver a mobile-first, accessible UI using Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind, shadcn UI, and Zod validation.

features.name: User Sign Up
features.description: Create a new student or professor account with unique university ID and role selection.
user_flows: Navigate to /signup -> Fill full name input field -> Fill university ID number input field -> Fill email input field -> Fill password input field -> Select role via radio button (Student) -> Click Sign Up button to submit -> Redirected to role-specific dashboard on success -> See student dashboard

Navigate to /signup -> Fill full name input field -> Fill university ID number input field with an ID that already exists -> Fill email input field -> Fill password input field -> Select role via radio button (Professor) -> Click Sign Up button to submit -> See error message on duplicate ID or invalid input

features.name: User Login
features.description: Authenticate with email and password and redirect to the user's role-specific dashboard.
user_flows: Navigate to /login -> Fill email input field -> Fill password input field -> Click Sign In button to submit -> Redirected to role-specific dashboard on success -> See dashboard
Navigate to /login -> Fill email input field with unknown email -> Fill password input field -> Click Sign In button to submit -> See error message on invalid credentials

features.name: Route Protection
features.description: Middleware enforces authentication and role-based routing, redirecting users to appropriate pages when access is not allowed.
user_flows: Navigate to /professor/dashboard as an authenticated professor -> See professor dashboard (access allowed)
Navigate to /professor/dashboard as an unauthenticated user -> Redirected to /login
Navigate to /professor/dashboard as an authenticated student -> Redirected to /student/dashboard
Navigate to /student/dashboard as an authenticated professor -> Redirected to /professor/dashboard

features.name: Professor Consultation Window Creation
features.description: Professors create date/time availability windows; the system auto-generates contiguous 15-minute slots and displays them in a slot grid.
user_flows: Navigate to /professor/dashboard -> Fill date picker -> Fill start time input -> Fill end time input (end after start) -> Click Create Window button -> See success toast with number of slots created -> See new window card with generated slot grid

Navigate to /professor/dashboard -> Fill date picker -> Fill start time input -> Fill end time input (end before start) -> Click Create Window button -> See client-side validation error preventing submission

features.name: Student Slot Booking
features.description: Students browse consultation windows, open booking dialogs for open slots, provide a required agenda of at least 10 characters, and book slots with realtime status updates.
user_flows: Navigate to /student/dashboard -> View list of consultation windows with slot grids -> Click an open (green) slot to open booking dialog -> Fill agenda textarea with at least 10 characters -> Click Confirm Booking button -> See success toast on successful booking -> Slot changes to Taken status in real-time

Navigate to /student/dashboard -> View list of consultation windows with slot grids -> Click an open (green) slot to open booking dialog -> Fill agenda textarea with fewer than 10 characters -> Click Confirm Booking button -> See validation error preventing submission

Navigate to /student/dashboard -> Click an open (green) slot to open booking dialog -> Another student books the slot concurrently -> Click Confirm Booking button -> See error indicating slot is no longer open -> See slot updated to Taken status in real-time

features.name: Sign Out
features.description: Sign out the current user from the header and return them to the login page.
user_flows: Open any authenticated page -> Click Sign Out button in the header -> Redirected to /login page
Open any authenticated page -> Click Sign Out button in the header -> Sign-out request fails due to network error -> See error toast and remain on current page
